text: Georg Smefjell (9 June 1937 - 6 December 2015)Georg Smefjell's obituary was a Norwegian ice hockey player. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in 1964 and in 1968. He was awarded Gullpucken as best Norwegian ice hockey player in 1969. He was born in Mysen. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1937 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Frisk Asker Ishockey players Category:Ice hockey players at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:People from Eidsberg
title: Georg Smefjell
